General_Description: '''Ares and the Savages''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "[[Athens]] fears the expansion of the [[Followers of Ares]] and is willing to pay to see them dead." – [[Nation Leader|Leader]] of (region)
Section_Outcome: Kassandra killed Followers of Ares in the Athenian region, and was rewarded for doing so.
Section_Behind_the_scenes: This very same contract appears also under the names [[Cannibal Annihilation]], [[Inside Threat]], and [[The Taste of Flesh]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
